name: mark duck
notes:
**size**
one size

**measurements**
height: approx. 25 cm / 9.8”

**materials**
pica pau cotton 8/7 nude
1 skein of color 21

pica pau cotton 8/7
2 skeins of color 30
1 skein of color 01
1 skein of color 10
1 skein of color 16
1 skein of color 23
1 skein of color 33

crochet hook 2.75 mm / us c2
2 safety eyes 8 mm
stuffing
tapestry needle
stitch marker

**yarn quality**
pica pau cotton 8/7 nude, hobbii
100% cotton
50 g (1.75 oz) = 90 m (98 yds)

pica pau cotton 8/7, hobbii
100% cotton
50 g (1.75 oz) = 90 m (98 yds)

**pattern information**
mark duck is an intermediate project, worked in a continuous spiral. to keep track of the rounds you may use a stitch marker or safety pin to mark the beginning of a round.
the head, body and legs are worked in a single piece. mark duck also has 2 accessories: a hat and a vest.

remember that it’s always advisable to give the entire pattern a read before starting crocheting and, most importantly, be patient with yourself!
